name: Infinite Smash Game
description:
Arrow Keys: Move

C: Heal (Healing amount randomizes from 2-4)

X: Punch Right

Z: Punch Left

A: Shoot Left

S: Shoot Right

D: Teleport while holding a certain direction

The bar under your HP bar is your energy meter. Every time you teleport 1 piece of it disappears. It automatically regenerates, so there is no need to press any button to charge. Healing takes 1 bar of energy. Also, the bullets take away 2 bars of your energy meter, so use them wisely.

Alright, now that I have gone over the instructions, its time to tell you what to do. It is a infinite score based survival game, just play until ya can't anymore. Story to the game will be added later
